# Assignments for Unit 4 - Projects {#sec-assignment4}

::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"}
This includes the list of assignments for Unit 4 associated with Projects.
:::

```{r}
#| label: tbl-unit4assignments
#| tbl-cap: Assignments from Unit 4
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)

assignment <- c('Haley et al., Historical Redlining and Present Air Pollution in US Cities')
due.Date <- c('Oct 21, 2022')
source <- c('https://pubs.acs.org/doi/pdf/10.1021/acs.estlett.1c01012')

unit4 <- data.frame(assignment, due.Date, source)# %>% 

unit4 %>% mutate(link = cell_spec(row.names(.), 'html', link = source)) %>% 
  select(-source) %>% 
  kableExtra::kable('html', escape = FALSE) %>% 
  kable_material_dark(c('condensed', 'hover')) %>% 
  column_spec(1, width = '20em') #%>

```
